context.p: You can view a list of all visits that have not yet been completed from the Visit manager.
To view a list of all active visits:

step.cmd: In the Active Visit Summary panel, click the active visits hyperlink. A window is displayed, listing all active visits.

info.note: You can refresh the statistics in the Active Visit Summary panel by clicking the window name in the sidebar, or by pressing the F5 key on your keyboard.
